cause.description:
Horses are being slaughtered all around the world. this has to be stopped. Horses are beautiful animals that have the right to live they are treated unfairly and in a inhumane way. so help me stop the slaughter of horses.
1. horse slaughter must stop immediately
2. Horses have the right to a loving home just like people
3. Horses need to be treated in an humane way.
cause.name: Stop Horse Slaughter
